item.description:
Join me and 100-200 other New Haven denizens for the August Critical Mass Ride. Never heard of critical mass? It's a celebratory bike ride through streets to have a good time and remind drivers that bicycles are traffic too. If you want a more detailed explanation you can always ask mr. google. Otherwise meet on the Green at 5:30 with your bicycle. Ride leaves around 6:00. Sometimes shortly before, sometimes after six...best to be there early!

Tom (and also Eric) are the contacts for this event: Tom- 203 444-6380, Eric- 860-214-9361
item.name: August Critical Mass
